attributes.action: STOP HIGHSHORE SECONDARY SCHOOL FROM CLOSING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WANT TO STOP THE CO LOCATION OF HIGHSHORE AND AMR TO STOP THE CLOSURE OF HIGHSHORE SCHOOL

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
